title.rendered: Expert Webinar: Blockchain — A Revolution You Can’t Stop

content.rendered:
Major players in Banking, Healthcare, Government, and Supply Chain are actively exploring the practical applications of blockchain and its transformational impact on business. Intellectsoft’s blockchain experts come forth to share their experience and help you build your own blockchain solution.

The free 45-minutes webinar will take place on December 14, at 11am EST (4pm GMT). Register for Blockchain — A Revolution You Can’t Stop. Real-life Applications and Tangible Benefits for Business webinar now — and start transforming your business with blockchain tomorrow.

Intellectsoft has delivered several blockchain-based solutions. At the webinar, our Senior FinTech consultant Sergei Bulgakov and Chief Blockchain Evangelist Tim Kozak will cover everything from smart contracts to decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs), provide real-life examples, explain blockchain customisation rules and how to choose your level of transparency, and many more.

Blockchain is transforming the enterprise as we know it. Blockchain-based solutions allow businesses to achieve the highest level of security, precisely automate the operations, introduce an unseen level of transparency, and generate revenue in new ways.

Intellectsoft will help you make the first solid steps towards creating a stable and secure blockchain solution tailored for your business. Click here to register for the free webinar.

excerpt.rendered: A 45-minute blockchain webinar from our experts.
